text: Thalassobacillus pellis is a Gram-positive, moderately halophilic, endospore- forming, strictly aerobic and motile bacterium from the genus of Thalassobacillus which has been isolated from salted animal hides from Istanbul in Turkey. ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Thalassobacillus pellis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacillaceae Category:Bacteria described in 2011
title: Thalassobacillus pellis
